intro.p: Complete the three tasks below. Clearly mark which of your sketches lines up with each task.

content.p: Sketch the graph of something which is a relation but is not a function. Explain how you know that it is not a function.

outtro.p: The following graph is only a relation because it fails the vertical line test.

content.p: Sketch the graph of something which is a function but is not 1-1. Explain how you know that it is a function and how you know is 1-1.

outtro.p: The following graph is a function because it passes the vertical line test. It is not 1-1 because it fails the horizontal line test.

content.p: Sketch the graph of a 1-1 function. Explain how you know it is a 1-1 function.

outtro.p: The following graph is a 1-1 function because it passes both the vertical and horizontal line tests.
